title: Corporate America Bingeing on Debt, Mini-Trade Deal Possible, Everyone Has a Wealth Number
itunes:title: Corporate America Bingeing on Debt, Mini-Trade Deal Possible, Everyone Has a Wealth Number
description:
Bloomberg News Corporate Finance Reporter Molly Smith discusses how blue-chip U.S. companies have begun to ramp up borrowing again as central banks globally flood economies with money. Andy Browne, Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director, breaks down the latest turns in the trade war between the world’s two largest economies. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg Businessweek Economics Editor Peter Coy explain how a new index gives everyone in the world a number from -2 to 11. And we Drive to the Close with Alan Zafran, Founding Partner and Co-CEO at IEQ Capital.

Hosts: Lisa Abramowicz and Paul Sweeney. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
